name: Alchemist Crisis
description:
Here is our entry for the Ludum Dare 49 with the theme "Unstable" ! Awesome project with talented people. We are discussing upgrading it to allow online multiplayer, polish assets and improve readability.

"The kingdom’s out of gold and the king cannot afford to keep all of its alchemists ! Fight against the others emerge victorious in this chemical battle. Collect Elements, throw them at your opponents and watch the laboratory evolve into chaos. Beware of the hazards !"

Known issues :

  • Sometimes, round end when two players remains.
  • PlayStation controllers seems to have an issue using the right stick. Please use Xbox controllers or similar.
